The paint goes on smooth with no mess, while marking opaque and glossy on light and dark surfaces.","brand":"Sharpie","newarrival":"false","disablePinterestCommerce":"false","departmentName":"DECORATIVE ART","upc":"00886946329876","manufacturer-sku":"37371PP","groundShipOnly":"false","min-order-quantity":"1","store-non-revenue-flag":"false","sharpPoint":"false","refinementColor":"Assorted","smallMagnets":"false","store-force-price-flag":"false","long-description":"
These oil-based paint markers are perfect for decorating and adding colorful accents to a variety of items—even non-porous materials like glass and hard plastics. The paint goes on smooth with no mess, while marking opaque and glossy on light and dark surfaces. And, since these permanent markers won't bleed through heavy weight paper or wash away, they're ideal for scrapbooking, posters, banners and signs. These fine tip markers are great for detailing, writing and touch ups and can be used on metal, pottery, wood, rubber, glass, plastic and stone.
 
Details:
  • Black, red, blue, yellow and white
  • Fine point
  • 5 markers
  • Oil based
  • Quick drying
  • Resistant to water, fading and abrasion
  • Not for use on fabric
  • Xylene free
  • AP certified nontoxic

This oil-based paint marker is perfect for decorating and adding vibrant accents to a variety of items—even non-porous materials like glass and hard plastics. It goes on smooth with no mess, while marking opaque and glossy on light and dark surfaces. And, since the permanent marker won't bleed through heavy weight paper or wash away, it's ideal for scrapbooking, posters, banners and signs. This wide tip marker is great for writing, filling and touch ups and may be used on metal, pottery, wood, rubber, glass, plastic and stone.
 
Details:
  • Available in multiple colors
  • Bold point
  • Oil based
  • Quick drying
  • Resistant to water, fading and abrasion
  • Not for use on fabric
  • Xylene free
  • AP certified nontoxic

These oil-based paint markers are perfect for decorating and adding metallic accents to a variety of items—even non-porous materials like glass and hard plastics. The paint goes on smooth with no mess, while marking opaque and glossy on light and dark surfaces. And, since these permanent markers won't bleed through heavy weight paper or wash away, they're ideal for scrapbooking, posters, banners and signs. These extra fine tip markers are great for detailing and writing and and can be used on metal, pottery, wood, rubber, glass, plastic and stone.
 
Details:
  • Gold and silver
  • Extra fine point
  • 2 markers
  • Oil based
  • Quick drying
  • Resistant to water, fading and abrasion
  • Not for use on fabric
  • Xylene free
  • AP certified nontoxic

These oil-based paint markers are perfect for decorating and adding stylish accents to a variety of items—even non-porous materials like glass and hard plastics. The paint goes on smooth with no mess, while marking opaque and glossy on light and dark surfaces. And, since these permanent markers won't bleed through heavy weight paper or wash away, they're ideal for scrapbooking, posters, banners and signs. These medium tip markers are great for writing and touch ups and can be used on metal, pottery, wood, rubber, glass, plastic, and stone.
 
Details:
  • Aqua, lime, orange, pink and purple
  • Medium point
  • 5 markers
  • Oil based
  • Quick drying
  • Resistant to water, fading and abrasion
  • Not for use on fabric
  • Xylene free
  • AP certified nontoxic

These oil-based paint markers are perfect for decorating and adding bold accents to a variety of items—even non-porous materials like glass and hard plastics. The paint goes on smooth with no mess, while marking opaque and glossy on light and dark surfaces. And, since these permanent markers won't bleed through heavy weight paper or wash away, they're ideal for scrapbooking, posters, banners and signs. These medium tip markers are great for writing and touch ups and can be used on metal, pottery, wood, rubber, glass, plastic and stone.
 
Details:
  • Black, gold, red, silver and white
  • Medium point
  • 5 markers
  • Oil based
  • Quick drying
  • Resistant to water, fading and abrasion
  • Not for use on fabric
  • Xylene free
  • AP certified nontoxic

    This all-purpose, premium-quality acrylic paint is perfect for decorative painting, home décor projects and general craft painting projects. It's versatile, so you can also use it for sponge painting, faux finishing, stenciling and more. Apply this paint to almost any surface including: canvas, wood, plaster, resin, paper mache, candles, walls, fabric, leather, Styrofoam®, ceramic bisque, polymer clay, watercolor paper, poster board and metal. The highly pigmented paint blends easily, has a consistent viscosity, has lightfast pigments and cleans up easily with soap and water when wet. You will love its smooth and creamy texture, vivid colors and durable finish.

    • Available in multiple colors
    • 2 fl. oz. (59 ml)
    • Water-based
    • Matte finish
    • Nontoxic

    This all-purpose, premium-quality acrylic paint is perfect for decorative painting, home décor projects and general craft painting projects. It's versatile, so you can also use it for sponge painting, faux finishing, stenciling and more. Apply this paint to almost any surface including: canvas, wood, plaster, resin, paper mache, candles, walls, fabric, leather, Styrofoam®, ceramic bisque, polymer clay, watercolor paper, poster board and metal. The highly pigmented paint blends easily, has a consistent viscosity, has lightfast pigments and cleans up easily with soap and water when wet. You will love its smooth and creamy texture, vivid colors and durable finish.

    • Water-based

    • Nontoxic

These disposable plastic icing bags are ideal for any decorating project that requires a wide variety of creams, frostings and fillings, as there’s no need to wash out a cotton or canvas bag after each application. These 12\" bags fit standard decorating tips and couplers and can be used without them for even more convenience. The transparent plastic makes it easy to see how much frosting is left in the bag. Cleanup couldn’t be quicker and easier—once decorating is done, the bags can simply be disposed!

Frost or pipe beautiful icing basics, borders and more with ease using this handy decorating turntable. The rubberized ring around the turntable surface helps to hold layers in place as they’re frosted, and a nonskid base helps to keep the entire turntable from moving around. A convenient switch locks the turntable surface in place when necessary during the decorating of cakes, pies and even cupcakes. And because it has a fun \"I Love Frosting\" design right in the center of the turntable, it also works as a cake stand!

The fondant smoother is an essential piece of equipment when rolling or embossing fondant. Use this decorating tool to smooth sheets of fondant over cakes and remove puffed areas and wrinkles for beautiful-looking desserts. The fondant smoother's edges are rounded to create even results without leaving marks and the width and length maximizes coverage across top surfaces and around cake sides. These cake decorating tools are handy pieces of equipment for adding special effects, details, and finishing touches to fondant and gum paste decorations. The kit includes seven tools for a wide variety of detail work. The kit also comes with a palette knife for cutting, lifting, and positioning fondant decorations, even in hard-to-reach areas, and a pair of modeling picks. The durable tools feature comfortable rubberized grips for a secure grasp and come in a convenient tin storage box. 
 
Contents:
  • Veining Tool
  • Cutting wheel tool
  • Scriber/cone tool
  • Ball tool
  • Umbrella tool
  • Dog bone tool
  • Shell/knife tool
  • Palette tool
  • Large modeling pick
  • Small modeling pick

Gift Note: This item ships in packaging that will reveal its contents.
 
Specially designed for creative use, this table is the perfect workspace for arts and crafts projects, sketching, drafting and more. Its large work surface has one-hand tilt so you can adjust your work up to a 45-degree angle, and there's an additional flat surface that expands your available space. Made from durable, heavy gauge steel, the desk features a 24\" x 15\" extended work surface as well as a 24\" slide-up pencil ledge. With ample storage space (thanks to a built-in art tray and cup holder as well as an under-table shelf and drawers), you can keep all of your supplies safely within reach.
 
Details:
  • 55\" x 24\" x 26\"-35\" (adjustable height)
  • 34\" x 24\" table surface (extends up to 16\")
  • One-hand tilt adjustment (up to 45 degrees)
  • 2 drawers (12\" x 18\" each)
  • Stool with padded seat included

ACCESS","upc":"00886946376078","manufacturer-sku":"MIA-01","groundShipOnly":"false","min-order-quantity":"1","store-non-revenue-flag":"false","sharpPoint":"false","refinementColor":"Multi","smallMagnets":"false","store-force-price-flag":"false","long-description":"
Glitz Knitz Miami showcases the festive glitz of Florida's hot spot for colorful celebration. Work this tiered ladder yarn into amazing beads, earrings, and bangle bracelets, or crochet several skeins into unique home décor such as baskets or ball jar cozies. Glitz Knitz Miami combines artfully with other Glitz Knitz yarns to create one-of-a-kind designs. 
 
Contents: 94% polyamide, 6% metallic
Skein Weight: 0.88 oz. / 25 g
Yardage: 11 yd. / 10 m
 
Knitting Gauge:
10 sts - 13 rows = 4\" (10 cm)
 
Suggested Knitting Needle:
12.75 mm, US - 17
Suggested Crochet Hook:
16 mm, US - Q

Reusable bobbins are a must have when doing kumihimo braids. The protective locking mechanism protects the thread while making it easy to pull slack while doing a braid. The spools can hold any type of stringing material: Dazzle-it!™ Rattail Cord, yarn, ribbon, silk, hemp, leather and more. Just wind the cord around the center and snap the sides shut to hold the cord in place. String large spools of cord or thread onto these mini bobbins for easy portability.

  • 50mm x 16mm
  • 8 spools
  • Translucent rubber bobbins are flexible

Also known as satin cord, rattail cord is a wonderful material for use in jewelry making and crafts. Flexible and easy to work with, it's available in rich, vibrant colors to add a quality look to crafts and jewelry designs. This cord is especially suitable for creating Kumihimo braid style bracelets and necklaces. You can also use it for micro macramé, Chinese knotting, paper crafts, drawstrings and even shoe laces.
 
Details:
  • Available in assorted colors
  • 1.5 mm
  • 10 yd.
  • 100% nylon

Create beautiful corded braids with this easy-to-use braiding disk. The disk is part of Kumihimo, an ancient Japanese braiding technique that lets you create round style braids with any flexible cord or wire. Simply wrap cord around the disk in certain color patterns and continue to reposition the cord around the rim notches in certain groupings and directions. The technique is simple and yields dozens of complex and intriguing patterns. Easily create bracelets, necklaces and belts from the patterned braids by adding jewelry findings and accents, such as beads and charms.
 
Details:
  • 15 cm in diameter
  • 2.5 cm hole
  • Recommended cord size is .5 mm to 3 mm 
  • Works well with Dazzle-it!™ Rattail Cord
  • Includes braiding instructions

Create beautiful corded braids with this easy-to-use braiding disk. The plate is part of Kumihimo, an ancient Japanese braiding technique that lets you create square or flat style braids with any flexible cord or wire. Simply wrap cord around the disk in certain color patterns and continue to reposition the cord around the rim notches in certain groupings and directions. The technique is simple and yields dozens of complex and intriguing patterns. Easily create bracelets, necklaces and belts from the patterned braids by adding jewelry findings and accents, such as beads and charms.
 
Details:
  • 14 cm x 14 cm
  • 3.5 cm hole
  • Recommended cord size is .5 mm to 3 mm 
  • Works well with Dazzle-it!™ Rattail Cord
  • Includes braiding instructions

Also known as satin cord, rattail cord is a wonderful material for use in jewelry making and crafts. Flexible and easy to work with, it's available in rich, vibrant colors to add a quality look to crafts and jewelry designs. This cord is especially suitable for creating Kumihimo braid style bracelets and necklaces. You can also use it for micro macramé, Chinese knotting, paper crafts, drawstrings and even shoe laces.

  • Available in assorted colors
  • 1.5 mm
  • 10 yd.
  • 100% nylon

Also known as satin cord, rattail cord is a wonderful material for use in jewelry making and crafts. Flexible and easy to work with, it's available in rich, vibrant colors to add a quality look to crafts and jewelry designs. This cord is especially suitable for creating Kumihimo braid style bracelets and necklaces. You can also use it for micro macramé, Chinese knotting, paper crafts, drawstrings and even shoe laces.
 
Details:
  • Available in assorted colors
  • 1.5 mm
  • 10 yd.
  • 100% nylon

Also known as satin cord, rattail cord is a wonderful material for use in jewelry making and crafts. Flexible and easy to work with, it's available in rich, vibrant colors to add a quality look to crafts and jewelry designs. This cord is especially suitable for creating Kumihimo braid style bracelets and necklaces. You can also use it for micro macramé, Chinese knotting, paper crafts, drawstrings and even shoe laces.
 
Details:
  • Available in assorted colors
  • 1.5 mm
  • 10 yd.
  • 100% nylon

This item is sold individually in store.
 
Let your imagination run free! This unfinished wood plaque makes a great frame or base for handmade wall decor. It is the perfect size for 12\" x 12\" scrapbook paper and has a tracing template for you to use with paper or fabric. Embellish the lightweight plaque with scrapbook paper, rhinestones, paint, artificial flowers, letters, 3-D objects and much more. 
 
Details:
  • Unfinished wood plaque with small edge
  • 12\" x 12\"
  • Peel-N-Trace™ Template included

Also known as satin cord, rattail cord is a wonderful material for use in jewelry making and crafts. Flexible and easy to work with, it's available in rich, vibrant colors to add a quality look to crafts and jewelry designs. This cord is especially suitable for creating Kumihimo braid style bracelets and necklaces. You can also use it for micro macramé, Chinese knotting, paper crafts, drawstrings and even shoe laces.

  • Available in assorted colors
  • 1.5 mm
  • 10 yd.
  • 100% nylon

All woodcrafters will appreciate this knife set. This top-quality set is ideal for cutting, trimming, scoring and chiseling light- to heavy-weight materials. It features a heavy-weight knife handle with aluminum collet and an assortment of useful blades and gouges, all organized in a handsome wooden box.
 
Contents:
  • Wooden box with latch
  • #5 heavy duty knife
  • 5 blades (deburring, large curved, whittling, heavy chiseling, narrow keyhole saw)
  • 6 gouges (narrow chisel, wide chisel, narrow V, wide V, U, wide U)

Each mat has been customized to match the weight of commonly used crafting materials.","brand":"Cricut","departmentName":"SCRAPBK TECHNOLOGY","upc":null,"manufacturer-sku":"2002217","groundShipOnly":"false","min-order-quantity":"1","store-non-revenue-flag":"false","sharpPoint":"false","smallMagnets":"false","store-force-price-flag":"false","long-description":"
      Ensure extraordinary results with these three Cricut cutting mats. Each mat has been customized to match the weight of commonly used crafting materials. The StandardGrip mat is perfect for a wide range of medium-weight materials, including patterned paper, vinyl, iron-on and cardstock. The long-lasting LightGrip mat is specially formulated for lightweight materials so you can easily cut and remove common office printer paper, vellum, light cardstock and more. The StrongGrip mat offers a strong hold surface perfect for heavyweight materials such as specialty cardstock, glitter cardstock, chipboard and fabric with stiffener, and it also features double life adhesive technology.
       
      Details:
      • 12\" x 12\" each
      • 3 mats
      • Features double life adhesive technology
      • For use with Cricut Expression® and Cricut Expression® 2 machines
      Contents:
      • LightGrip adhesive cutting mat
      • StandardGrip adhesive cutting mat
      • StrongGrip adhesive cutting mat

The sky’s the limit with the glamorous and sassy Cricut glitter iron-on. Use it to customize T-shirts, team or club wear, bags, aprons, home décor and more! Cute shapes, logos, letters and intricate designs are all a cut-and-press away with this easy heat transfer material. You can even use it to adorn pillows, blankets, basket liners and wall hangings. The glittering color adds plenty of festivity to any occasion—or flair to everyday fun.

The sky’s the limit with the glamorous and sassy Cricut glitter iron-on. Use it to customize T-shirts, team or club wear, bags, aprons, home décor and more! Cute shapes, logos, letters and intricate designs are all a cut-and-press away with this easy heat transfer material. You can even use it to adorn pillows, blankets, basket liners and wall hangings. The glittering color adds plenty of festivity to any occasion—or flair to everyday fun.

        The Maxine’s Mop brush (named for artist Maxine Thomas) is a great tool for every acrylic painter’s toolbox. This short handle mop brush is a full, oval brush with a slightly flattened ferrule that is excellent for blending and softening work. Designed for intermediate craft painters and fine artists, Maxine’s mop is made with all natural goat hair, and it has a seamless, painted wood handle and a nickel-plated ferrule.

        • Available in multiple sizes
        • Natural goat hair filament
